taskbody.prereq: To successfully divide two numbers, you must know what is division.

context.p: Use this task to divide two numbers using the division feature of the JPS calculator.

taskbody.result: The result from the division is displayed.
taskbody.example: If you want to divide 4 by 2, the equation will look like 4/2=2. The result 2 appears on the display screen.
